data.title: CDTFA: Cannabis Tax Revenues Total $60.9 Million in First Quarter
data.excerpt: Sacramento – The California Department of Tax and Fee Administration (CDTFA) today released revenue numbers for cannabis sales in the first quarter of 2018.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
